title: Apple tart with mulberry and blackberry ice cream
description: If you can’t find any mulberries, just use blackberries - the ice cream will still be delicious. The recipe is also suitable for frozen berries.Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need an ice cream maker.
ingredients: ½ vanilla pod, cut in half lengthways and seeds scraped out
3 Bramley apples, peeled, cored and roughly chopped
2 Pink Lady apples, peeled, cored and thinly sliced
